content.detailedDescription: Walking home one night after coming from a friends house. approximately 2 miles across the water from north wales to the merseyside the ufo was stationery in the sky. at that time of day it was already dark with no sun in the sky. this object was fading in and fading out so i decided to take a picture because of how abnormal the light looked. planes were flying around the sky at the time due to liverpool airport being close but this object was far bigger then any of the planes in the sky. the light was im the sky for approx 4 mins and did change shape until it eventually vanished. on a personal level i would just say i was intrigued to find out what the light was because of how abnormal i was acting.
content.summary: Very large like a blimp shape much larger then an aeroplane 5x greater size atleast.

content.detailedDescription: I was in brownsville in mid aug eat i seen a light that caught my attention. so i got out my phone and took pictures and a short video. i watched it for like an hour. i then went inside. when i looked at the video and pictures i was amazed at what i seen. it looks to me like somethi g from star wars like a landing station or something it looks like doors open and close. it also looks like other light come up and go inside of it. i have seen this type of lights since i have lived in montana but never got pictures or a video like this i would like to no what it is. i just went inside i am not sure why i did but i did i do have more and the phone is a message phone so hopefully we can get ahold of each other some how thank you
content.summary: I was in the driveway of the trailer court i seen a light that seemed to catch my eye it looked like it was moving a bit nd smaller lights were going towards it so i took es and a small video

content.detailedDescription: I was with my family driving back from the animal shelter. and i noticed a ball of light falling from the sky. i knew it wasn't a plane or miltary craft i'm sure. it wasn't going straight it looked like it was falling straight down then it looked like and upside down tear drop. then it disappeared. i feel like it was meant for me to see. like i was the only one seeing it and stuck in that moment. i feel like i've been being watched since then. i wanna see proof and know that it's real.
content.summary: Looked like a ball of light and kinda changed into a blue or greenish color.

content.detailedDescription: Saw a red object heading sourh in the oklahoma panhandle. 3 mikes s of balko school. thought it was a plane then it stopped and turned blue hovered about 3 mins. then it headed n and turned orange i followed down dirt road it stopped and hovered i watched with binoculars. i can see a object behind light with my binoculars but couldn't tell shape. it then shot off to the n at a high rate of speed and disappeared. i would like to know if anybody seen it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw red light heading south stopped turned blue and hovered about 3mins. headed south i followed pulled over and watched with binoculars.

content.detailedDescription: Gf and i were travelling to hudson, ny on i90 east around 9pm when we saw an object in the sky near the highway. it had very bright lights and we thought it was probably a helicopter flying a medivac route or military. didn't think much of it. around 10pm went outside house in columbiaville, ny and saw 3 craft like the one we saw on the highway earlier in  the sky. they were moving slow with no regular patterns. they were low on the horizon. one craft was due south of the house and as i watched flew over the barn across the street and came over our house. the craft made a low rumble, moved fairly slow and the best shape i can describe is it looked like the space shuttle from the bottom. my gf and mom saw a beam of white light go down to the ground for a few seconds from one of the craft. eventually there were 6- 8 craft in the air. i called 911, they indicated they had no other calls. i also called the columbia county sherriffs and they said the same. this was a localized event after 10pm in a rural area and unless you were skywatching you wouldn't have seen this. the event lasted about 60-90 minutes. i'm an electrical engineer and a skeptic but have no explanation for what the 4 of us saw that night. (nov 4, 2016)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed by 4 people, multiple ufos. outline looked like space shuttle

content.detailedDescription: I saw lights that were hovering over pochuck mtn from pine island town. looked like the object was spinning when watching the lights at a closer view. the lights were bright definitely not a star or a drone or a helicopter it seemend to drift to the south a little. i went to get a better camera and it was gone
content.summary: Lights that were hovering over pochuck mtn. looked like the object was spinning when watching the lights.

content.detailedDescription: We had horse event. i was taking pictures, i havent seen any thing on the sky, but after event i saw something on picture. there was no sound, non of us haven't seen this object. but horses felt someting i think. they were stressed a bit, but we thougt that its becouse of event.
content.summary: Horse event

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room trying to get some sleep for school the next day. all of a sudden 2 very bright lights flashed lasting five seconds or less, causing my whole room to be lit up with light. at first i thought it was just a car leaving or entering my apartment complex, but when i looked out of my window there was nothing there. it appeared as if it was moving towards the entrance of the apartment complex, but like i said before, there was nothing out there when i looked. after the flashes, and seeing that there was nothing out there, i was kinda freaked out. i only ever had sight of the lights, i never saw an object. my hypothesis about what happened was an object probably came down and hovered for a few seconds, and then took off, up into the sky. i really have no hard evidence, but i have been conducting research on ufos and the men in black, which gives me reason to believe they're watching me.
content.summary: I was laying in my room and 2 bright flashes lit up my room.

content.detailedDescription: I just getting ready for bed when a strange object appeared in the sky outside my bedroom window. at first i thought it was just a reflection on the window but as i looked closer i could see that it was a series of lights. there were maybe 20 lights, all closely grouped together, they moved like a snake through the sky. their movements were jerky and their shap reapidly fluxiating. this was visible for about 20-30 seconds before all the lights simply disappeared.
content.summary: Saw a group of little lights moving like a snake across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was working, in the downtown houston area, on 11/23/2016. it was around 3:15 in the afternoon. upon exiting my vehicle, i noticed the reflection of light in the sky. it was stationary, and appeared to change shape. after about 30 to 45 seconds, the object began moving very slowly,  to the east/ south east. it made no sound, or was too far away to distinguish sound. elevation did not appear to change. stopped recording video, when visual contact was obstructed by a building. began recording again, when visual was regained. feeling confident that it was moving slow enough to re-aquire, i entered a building. wasnt inside for more than a minute, and when i came back outside, the object was nowhere to be found. i was able to record the object for just over 4 minutes.
content.summary: Object hovered, then moved very slowly to the east, changing shape

content.detailedDescription:
This is pretty vague so i'm sorry.
but when i was a child some time in the 90's (i think between 91-94)
i was outside playing at a park with a girl thatnliced next door to me. we both saw something in the sky i'd guess about 100 feet to 300 feet above us floating with a hum. in one direction.
the only way i can describe it is long and like 300 feet in length and had a strange mechanical look to it like bumps and ridges, think like a black circuit board, or kinda like those borg ships on star treck, just the exterior texture.
after we moved and left alaska we then visited and i spoke with that girl and asked if she remembered it happening and she did.
we tried to follow it on our bikes at the time but it was way to fast and almost seemed like it gained speed the further it got from us. i'm in my 30s now... never forgot it and always thought i should share this story. i don't know why. it's odd, i always had a strange fascination with ufos and aliens as a child and still do.
guess i'm lucky to have seen what i have. as a child i used to get nose bleeds constantly while we lived life in the airforce which immediately stopped when we moved to the u.K. always thought that was odd.
content.summary: Elmendorf alaska 90's huge long object kinda looked like black circuit board

content.detailedDescription:
I just finished watching the 48 hour show labeled "a mother accused" the mother in the show was lacey spears. during the opening, after the introduction the camera pans to a train yard, and i noticed an object from the lower right to the top left of the screen. can you explain this, and has anyone else voiced the question?

thanx mike mariano
content.summary: Saw this on a 48 hour tv show

content.detailedDescription: 2016 thanksgiving night i was home with kids and one of my friends. me and my friend not doing anything at the time just sitting around talking . so we decided to go outside to smoke. i'll say we're outside no more than may a minute my back was turn towards the house on my back porch. then i turn. i see three objects in the sky glowing bright pulsating moving abnormally.  i tell my friend to look and i ask him what is that he replied i don't know. they all just disappear one by on two by two. then came back some that seemed to be coming from off the ground.  the kids came out and all we're afraid and told them to go inside. as for me and my friend it was cool at first but then when thing start to really sink in we go in after i tuned the camera of before i walk in there was a fleet of them that seem to be come from the ground and a huge pyramid shape ship appeared for like 3 seconds then gone like the others did
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo sightings

content.detailedDescription: I walk with girlfriend and i saw this silver orb and make a picture .I didnt know whats is this . object hover in the sky. i go to home next day i didint see this.
content.summary: Hovering silver orb

content.detailedDescription: While i was driving up to washington state from california i took 4 pictures of mt shasta from my car. i was not looking very closely because i was driving. funny thing is i never really looked at these pictures till i was freeing up some storage space on my phone and found these 4 pictures. i'm not saying these are aliens from outer space, but it's not anything i am familiar with or have ever seen before or since.
content.summary: Driving up the 5 freeway. taking pictures of mt. shasta. i did not notice these ufo'so while i was taking pictures because i was looking in the camera. i found them after reviewing them at a much later date.

content.detailedDescription: I was seven at the time (25 years passed)and laying in my bed wide awake. i could hear a strong oscillating "thumming" noise coming from outside. i sat up in bed to hear more acutely. the thumming was moving from the west direction, which was the bay side of the waterfront property we lived on. there was dense vegetation surrounding the west and east sides of the house so this noise confused me. i was tucked into bed as it was well passed my bedtime. the aluminum blinds were down but light was always easily cast through them, so i can safely say this was not a car or helicopter of any sort. i could hear the thumming at a distance, and it sounded like it was coming up the path we carved down to the lake. it moved from the western side of the house and came around the contours of the house, stopping outside of my second story bedroom window, which was on the northern face of the house. the noise was accompanied by a brilliant green light that began to fill my room with the same intensity as the sound. it wasn't just a light, it illuminated everything, like a radioactive green. i felt compelled to leave my bed and go to the window but i fought this compulsion and pulled the blankets up to my eyes. i watched and listened for 5 minutes expecting something to happen. i became afraid after some time because the object wasn't moving, so i pulled the blankets over my head but i could still see the bright green through the cloth. it felt like they could only take me if i willingly came to the window. every fiber of my being was fighting the urge to look. i knew it was an alien craft and was confused why my parents or brothers were not waking up to the loud sound outside of our house. with the same pulsing thumming, the craft went straight up and i could hear its ascension and the slow fade of the oscillating thumm. the bright residue of light remained in my room until it began to fade away very very slowly. it was about another 5 minutes until my room had returned to darkness. the next morning i was eating breakfast and coloring and told my mother about what had happened. part of my wanted to keep it a secret but i had said "aliens came to my window last night to visit me, but i didn't want to go away from my family so i stayed". my mother was shocked and all she said was "oh that's cute dear, that et came to play" she laughed the story off and went about getting ready for her day of teaching. my story was always looked at like a dream or a tall tale.  i would like to conclude, as it may help, that i am the only daughter, and also the only member of my family who can claim psychic encounters or spiritual visitations. i can also claim losing a stillbirth, but during a time period when my partner and i were experiencing a long distance relationship. it is quite common for me to see lights moving in odd patterns in the night sky.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo hovers around west side (lake side) of house and takes path to north side stopping directly outside my bedroom window, filing room with bright green light

content.detailedDescription:
At work.
noticed a path cut through clouds but no air craft in site.
saw a blue mushroom shape light and took two pictures as fast as i could with samsung s3.
did not know what i saw, thought maybe light anomaly.
that's why i took pictures as fast as i could with my phone.
i've shown several people the pictures and told my account. 
some say a lens reflection...
i refer that i saw it with my eyes before taking pictures.
the object was onlying there for to quick shots and in a straight path ecelerated in a flash to nothing visible.
content.summary: Looked straight up saw path cut through clouds. saw blue mushroom shaped light and took two pictures with samsung s3

content.detailedDescription:
I am a serious amateur photographer with a degree in photojournalism. my background is photography and the armed forces, so i have professional experience in observing distant objects. 

i must emphasise that i did not see the object in person.

i was out taking photographs on the morning of the 22nd of november 2016. it was a nice morning, the weather was normal for this time of the year at the location. at 10.09.47 i took the attached raw file using my sony a7r with a shutter speed of 1/15 of a second at f9.5 at iso 50 with the camera firmly set down on my tripod.

i took the image, two different versions, one shot with a person passing through at 10.08.56, one without at 10.09.47. the first image has nothing odd at the location of the unusual looking object of note(i have studied the raw)

only upon studying the images in post using lightroom did i notice the object/flaw/bird/aberration. 

i am a very open minded person but always think 100% logically so under these circumstances(unless someone tells me otherwise)would consider this to be a bird/insect flying past or rubbish blowing. i would always opt for the choice that can be confirmed with evidence.

i have attached a copy of the unedited raw file. a copy of the same file with the curves slider pushed to enhance the shape of the object. and a crop of the curves slider pushed image to direct your eyes and to be able to quickly look at the object magnified.

i am of course sure that you will tell me its probably be a bird, but wanting a second opinion, i have sent it in to you guys to take a look anyway.

lee coates.
content.summary: Did not observe. just an unusual feature in camera raw file. maybe a bird/insect in flight.

content.detailedDescription: Me and three of my kids were at the greater moncton christmas parade on main street about 15 minutes before it started. we were all looking down the street waiting for it to get started, looking for the first floats. suddenly high up three or four distinct lights appeared and seemed to be in a slow descent. the lights were switching from green to red and vice versa. they were in a triangle or square like shape. the object stopped and i nudged my oldest son and pointed. i also began to tell those around me who were equally surprised and baffled. initially i thought maybe it was a plain but the way it moved so precisely and switched directions nearly instantly i knew it could not be. it stayed and hovered for about 30-45 seconds. during that time my son was taking out his phone to capture it on video. the lights then merged together as it was hovering in place, flashed green, red, then a bright white and continued to flash randomly. the object moved speedily to the left, turned and went back to where i initially saw it in the sky. due to the city lights my sons phone couldn't focus on the flying object. it flew backwards quickly and hovered in place for another ten or so seconds.And then accelerated diagonally north west getting smaller and smaller until it disappeared all together in the night sky. i felt both excited, eerie  and utterly baffled after the event took place.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three or four distinct lights, came down a little bit and hovered for awhile moved to the left, back , flew backwards, stopped. then took off

content.detailedDescription: Walking my dogs up a county road and suddenly witnessed bright lights in a local farmers field.. it seemed odd as i've walked that path many times and never seen anything like this! i took a picture and as i captured it the lights disappeared and my phone crashed
content.summary: Bright lights suddenly appear the disappear

content.detailedDescription:
Rattlesden, suffolk, uk, mitchery lane,(brettenham road end),out walking alone, heading north,quiet road, fields either side. not sure what made me look to the west- it was a very reflective object,so perhaps it just caught my eye.There's a gliding club in the village not far from there,so i did wonder if it was a glider but i couldn't see any wings...I was walking at a brisk pace and it was like the object was travelling alongside me but at some distance.I tried to take some pictures whilst it was still to the west of me but thought i had only taken pictures of the sky...Tried to record it as well...And then i just couldn't spot it anymore- it had been difficult to relocate the object once i lost sight of it trying to take a photo etc. at some point during this time a helicopter passed- but the object was much higher than the helicopter.The object reappeared more or less directly above me, still on mitchery lane, around 7/8 minutes later (when i took a better picture)...It was like it was hovering at this point and then once again it just disappeared (as in, it was like it turned invisible rather than 'took off'; at least i didn't see it take off).I passed a man and woman walking their dog not long after but didn't inquire as to whether they'd seen it...I think you would have had to have been looking hard to have noticed it though, just because it was so small/far away- that said, i felt like it was watching me throughout the sighting. i wouldn't say i was scared though, just very curious.

i've always wanted to see a ufo, and for this reason i think i just convinced myself at the time that it was wishful thinking and that the object was probably something identifiable. when i got home i thought i saw that i had only taken pictures of the sky- i knew that i hadn't  been able to see the object well on the phone screen- it was like i'd just been aiming randomly,so i forgot about the event almost immediately, until a week later (today) when i started thinking about it when out on the same walk; i also saw a ufo documentary that showed me something that reminded me of what i'd seen. i had another look at my pictures and to my surprise i realized i had actually captured the object three times...Very tiny and very close to the frame in each shot...It's an old samsung phone,so not the best camera,but when i zoomed in on the object- in one of the photos, it looked bulbous at the ends...Like two white balls stuck together side by side and elongated slightly...It looked shadowed underneath in the zoom too.The other two pics are less pronounced, but the object still looks a bit bulbous at the ends when you zoom in. definitely not a glider!!
content.summary: Very thin white shiny disc/cigar seen to the west,travelling north, reappeared around 7 mins later more or less above me

content.detailedDescription: Saw a small low flying object that kind of looked like model airplane without wings. at first thought it was a large buzzard as buzzards were flying around it when first sighted. it was about 200-300 feet in the air and less than quarter mile away. the thought of a drone came to mind but it was no drone i've ever seen. it was flying in a straight line and went behind the roof ridge of the building i was next to so quickly moved to keep an eye on it, but it vanished within the 2 seconds it took to move. it was heading g southeast. it was a matte brownish color. estimated size was 4-5 ft long and 1-2 ft wide. eleven minutes later felt a little sick to my stomach and face felt hot. this lasted about five minutes.
content.summary: Looked like brown model plane without wings

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were heading to my house,we were maybe 15miles from my house when i noticed a bright light low in the sky to our left.I pointed it out to my friend who was driving, it appeared to travel along side of us for the duration of our drive.It made no sound and no matter how fast we went it was just ahead of us,when we'd stop it would stop hover and come back towards us until we moved then it'd continue forward. it was very bright and appeared to rotate with a light pattern of pale blue,pinkish red,and white.
content.summary: A friend and i were heading to my house and noticed it in the sky,appeared to travel with us,just a bit faster

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in a car with my friend in the backseat, and someone else driving. we later entered the house and saw the object still in our range of vision.

2. my friend and i were looking out the back drivers-side window and spotted the object following our car.

3. we were unsure, but thought maybe it was a drone but thought that was unlikely, as we had never seen drones in that area.

4. at first, it simply appeared to be following us. it moved up and down very slightly but pretty much remained at a steady pace, just following for ten to fifteen minutes. when we entered the house, it hovered near our line of sight from the front window. i have no memory of seeing it depart, and i was abducted that night, which resulted in receiving an implant and, next year, having it surgically removed.

5. mostly we just watched it, however we were both somewhat bewildered and scared since we had no idea what it was.

6. i have no memory of seeing it depart, however i was abnormally tired once i reached the house, so i may not remember it because of that.
content.summary: Ufo followed us in car & remained outside house after arrival, was abducted same night.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my family trick or treating in falconbridge, on and as we were driving we witnessed a ufo hovering about 10 feet or so above a light post and i stopped and began to film it as it hovered in a stationary position. the ufo had a red light on it that seemed to be rotating and would turn to white and back to red. the craft also had white lights that seemed to pulsate al around it. i watched for several minutes as it slowly moved down edison street in falconbridge towards the highway and it stayed very low above houses and eventually became stationary over the woods off the road. i watched for about ten minutes total but had to continue trick or treating as my kids  were getting restless and my wife a little nervous.
content.summary: Ufo hovered above light post and moved to the left over some houses and eventually above the forest.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping in my house which is at a slight elevation to the center of westminster, md. around 4 am i woke up. outside my window, which faces and overlooks the city, i saw three unusual lights above the town: one white, one red and one green. my first thought was a fleet of aircraft, but the lights didn't move, and i realized after looking more closely that they were not separate, but mounted on the side of a large triangular object. the outline of the object was faint but definite. i would guess it was very large, probably over 100 feet in width, and it seemed to be at the altitude of a small plane (maybe 10,000 feet). it was fixed in place with lights pulsating, hovering over the town. i studied it for a while, going through possibilities of what i could be looking at before i decided it was an unidentified flying object! it hovered over the city, not seeming to move, and after several minutes still seemed locked in place. i went to do some research online about what it could possibly be, and when i looked up from my computer it was gone. unfortunately i did not to think to take a photograph of the object.
content.summary: Large, black triangular object with red, green and white lights hovering over westminster, md

content.detailedDescription: One summer/fall night my son stayed up late and decided to go outside on our back deck. he looked up and in the sky he saw this incredible object that was very bright. it was above the apartment complex next to our house. he heard no noise nothing. we do have a hospital helicopter and a small airport but you always hear when they are flying. we live in a very small town. population of 5,000. we live in the river valley. their is a big municipal park within eyesight. he and a friend also before this swore they saw little people when they were just sitting across the street by the church. he came home so panicked and scared. he kept looking through the blinds for he feared they saw where he went. he described them as short little beings. they ran down where i call it a ravine.  there is fresh running water and also a sewer.  he still to this day claims it was real and i never doubt my children for i'm a very spiritual being. please let us know if you can confirm the photos.
content.summary: My son was outside one night cause back then he stayed up late.  he of course was on his phone when all of a sudden this object appeared in the sky. he was excited yet confused as to what he saw. he told me about it right away.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a flight from dallas to cleveland when i took a several pictures of the super moon. only one frame showed these objects and it wasn't until i looked at the pictures that i saw the shapes.
content.summary: 2 bell shaped objects in sky moving upward with contrails underneath.

content.detailedDescription:
1. at my backyard.

2. i noticed something strange hovering above the area.

3. i realized that is something really strange, i ran in the house and grabbed my binocular and my digital camera ( canon 450 d with 55-200 lens ).

4. it was an shape shifting trans dimensional entity/object that at some point transformed itself into the perfect orb/portal and hovered above without any sound for several hours. 
an half hour or so another, now metallic object, ascend from nowhere and hovered as well beside the orb/portal and then descend into the orb/portal.
the orb/portal still hovered for some time and then start moving zig zag and suddenly descend in unknown speed.

5. i realized that our realm is not the only one.

6. it descended in unknown speed.

7.  note : contact me for more photos, because there is not enough attachment to upload more.
     thank you !
content.summary: Shape shifting trans dimensional entity created itself and hovered for couple of hours and then transformed itself into the orb/portal. an half hour after that another metallic object ascended from nowhere and hovered for some time near the orb/portal...

content.detailedDescription: My daughter took these shots outside our house tonight don't know what they are but unusual. first photo something on the light pole with 2 other colors around. 2nd 3rd and fourth shot you can see the main light but also purple and green lights around photo. also no power lines above light pole can see the lights change direction.
content.summary: Main object white light but green and purple light observed in photo's
